meanings.definition: Small pieces of paper or cardboard produced by punching holes
meanings.sent1: The teacher collected all the chads from the hole puncher.
meanings.sent2: I found some chads scattered on the floor after punching holes in the documents.
meanings.sent3: The chads from the hole puncher made a little confetti mess on the desk.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she used the chads to make a colorful collage.
meanings.sent5: The chads fluttered down like tiny snowflakes from the hole puncher.
